protocol_name: In vitro transcription of S. pyogenes Cas9 sgRNAs from two complementary oligos
protocol_name_html: In vitro transcription of S. pyogenes Cas9 sgRNAs from two complementary oligos
description: A protocol to in vitro transcribe sgRNAs from oligos for S. pyogenes Cas9.
before_start:
10X transcription buffer

  • 300mM Tris-Cl pH 8.1
  • 250mM MgCl2
  • 0.1% Triton X-100
  • 20mM spermidine
  • 100mM DTT
 
2x Denaturing gel loading buffer
  • 95% deionized formamide
  • 20mM EDTA pH 8.0
  • Dye (I typically use Bromophenol blue, Xylene Cyanol and Orange G in this. None overlap with sgRNA)
 
6x Agarose gel loading buffer
  • 25% Ficoll
  • Enough orange G so that the loading dye looks brighter than Orange Crush soda (~0.1%).

 

Gel extraction buffer

  • 1mM EDTA
  • 300mM NaOAc pH 5.2
  • 0.5 w/v SDS

materials.reagent_name: Phusion polymerase (or other high fidelity PCR polymerase)
T7 polymerase (We use homemade T7, but you can also use the Ambion MEGAshortscript kit)

warning: Please refer to the SDS (Safety Data Sheet) for safety warnings and hazard information.
guidelines:
The protocol workflow is as follows:

 

1) Order oligos

2) Anneal oligo, extend & amplify using PCR

3) Gel purify PCR products (optional)

4) Transcribe

5) Bead cleanup or gel purify RNA

 

Note that there are two G's inserted at the 5' end of all sgRNAs generated using this protocol that are outside the protospacer. These do not affect cleavage biochemically and are trimmed inside cells if nucleofected as an RNP.

 

It's recommended to start with a 100 µL transcription because the volumes are convenient and this is typically enough sgRNA. Scale up as needed.

 

References: 

Lin & Staahl, eLife 2014.

RNA: A Laboratory Manual (CSHL Press) Changelog: 1.01 - added references 1.1 - added bead cleanup
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data: Designing oligo templates for sgRNAs
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Designing oligo templates for sgRNAs

components.data:
Order two oligos that have ~20nt complementarity in the middle that span the guide RNA, with a T7 promoter at the 5' end. The sequence of the T7 promoter is TAATACGACTCACTATAGG.

 

Note that the first two G's here are added onto the template.

components.data: Designing oligo templates for sgRNAs
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Designing oligo templates for sgRNAs

components.data:
Oligo sequences:

 

Top: 5' - TAATACGACTCACTATAGGNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNGTTTTAGAGCTAGAAATAGCAAGTTAAAATAG - 3'

 

Bottom: 5' - AAAAAAGCACCGACTCGGTGCCACTTTTTCAAGTTGATAACGGACTAGCCTATTTTAACTTGCTATTTCT - 3'

 

sgRNA fwd primer: GGATCCTAATACGACTCACTATAG

 

sgRNA rev primer: AAAAAAGCACCGACTCGG
components.name: Description

components.data: Extend the oligos to a double-stranded DNA template by PCR (~1 hour)
components.name: Section

components.data:
Resuspend oligos to 100µM.

 

x nmol oligo * 10 = ul ddH2O to add to yield 100µM
components.name: Description

components.data: Extend the oligos to a double-stranded DNA template by PCR (~1 hour)
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Extend the oligos to a double-stranded DNA template by PCR (~1 hour)

components.data:
Set up two 100µL PCRs per sgRNA template. If just making one sgRNA or a small number, use the single-reaction setup. If making many, make the master mix and add 95µL of the master mix to each tube and 5µL of the sgRNA-specific top oligo.

 

Reagent Volume (µl) Master mix volume (µl) Number of reactions (2 * # of sgRNAs)
5x HF buffer 20 44 2
1 uM top oligo (sgRNA-specific) 2 -  
1 uM bottom oligo (always the same) 2 4.4  
100 uM sgRNA fwd 2    
100 uM sgRNA rev 2    
dNTPs 2 4.4  
phusion polymerase 1 2.2  
ddH2O 69 151.8
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Set up two 100µL PCRs per sgRNA template. If just making one sgRNA or a small number, use the single-reaction setup. If making many, make the master mix and add 95µL of the master mix to each tube and 5µL of the sgRNA-specific top oligo.

 

Reagent Volume (µl) Master mix volume (µl) Number of reactions (2 * # of sgRNAs)
5x HF buffer 20 44 2
1 uM top oligo (sgRNA-specific) 2 -  
1 uM bottom oligo (always the same) 2 4.4  
100 uM sgRNA fwd 2    
100 uM sgRNA rev 2    
dNTPs 2 4.4  
phusion polymerase 1 2.2  
ddH2O 69 151.8

components.data:
Run a PCR with the following program:

 

98°C for 2 minutes

 
 

98°C for 30 seconds

 

60°C for 30 seconds

 

72°C for 30 seconds

 

repeat for 30 cycles

 
 

72°C for 1 minute

 

4°C forever
components.name: Description

components.data: Analytical gel of the PCR(s) (~1 hour; ~2 hrs if gel purification required)
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Analytical gel of the PCR(s) (~1 hour; ~2 hrs if gel purification required)

components.data: Image the gel. If there is one major band around 100 nt, perform a PCR cleanup (Qiagen) and proceed directly to in vitro transcription. If there are multiple bands, pour a preparative 2% agarose gel(s) with comb large enough to hold the entire 200µL PCR volume, run the gel and gel purify (Qiagen)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Image the gel. If there is one major band around 100 nt, perform a PCR cleanup (Qiagen) and proceed directly to in vitro transcription. If there are multiple bands, pour a preparative 2% agarose gel(s) with comb large enough to hold the entire 200µL PCR volume, run the gel and gel purify (Qiagen)

components.data: In vitro transcription (~5 hours to overnight)
components.name: Section

source_data.section: In vitro transcription (~5 hours to overnight)

components.data: Prepare the transcription templates from above at ~100ng/µL or adjust the volume of template versus DEPC H2O in the table below. The amount of template is variable, and even 500 nanograms for a 100µL reaction should be plenty.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prepare the transcription templates from above at ~100ng/µL or adjust the volume of template versus DEPC H2O in the table below. The amount of template is variable, and even 500 nanograms for a 100µL reaction should be plenty.

components.data: In vitro transcription (~5 hours to overnight)
components.name: Section

source_data.section: In vitro transcription (~5 hours to overnight)

components.data:
Set up one of the reactions below depending on desired yield:

Reagent 100 ul reaction 1 ml reaction 5 ml reaction Final concentration
10X transcription buffer 10 100 500 1X
DTT (1 M) 2 20 50 20 mM
25 mM A/C/G/U mix 20 200 1000 5 mM
Pyrophosphatase (Roche) 0.5 1 5 1 ug/ml
T7 polymerase 10 100 500 100 ug/ml
Template (100 ng/ul) 10 100 500 1 uM
DEPC H2O 49.5 499 3 * 832 (2495)  
         
Expected yield ~50 micrograms ~500 micrograms ~2 mg  
Expected yield (sgRNA molarity) ~15 ul of 100 uM  ~150 ul of 100 uM > 500 ul of 100 uM
components.name: Description

source_data.annotation: I typically do not add pyrophosphatase until the reaction starts turning cloudy (after 30 minutes to 1 hour). This is a positive control that the transcription is working, and the PPIase then stops accumulation of PPI
source_data.thread_text: I typically do not add pyrophosphatase until the reaction starts turning cloudy (after 30 minutes to 1 hour). This is a positive control that the transcription is working, and the PPIase then stops accumulation of PPI

source_data.annotation: CRITICAL It is important to keep all reagents on ice but set up the reaction at room temperature in the order indicated. Cold spermidine (in the transcription buffer) can precipitate the template DNA.

components.data: Cleanup
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup

components.data:
Please select one of the following two Cleanup options: 

 

Cleanup option #1: bead cleanup (much faster, may purify truncated products or nucleotides)

 

Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA (more difficult, higher purity)
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Please select one of the following two Cleanup options: 

 

Cleanup option #1: bead cleanup (much faster, may purify truncated products or nucleotides)

 

Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA (more difficult, higher purity)

components.data: Excise gel slice with razor blade and place in Eppendorf tube (small txn) or conical tube (large txn).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Excise gel slice with razor blade and place in Eppendorf tube (small txn) or conical tube (large txn).

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: Crush gel slice with a P1000 tip or glass rod.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Crush gel slice with a P1000 tip or glass rod.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: Add enough gel elution buffer to cover gel bits so they can move around when rocked (typically ~500µL per 100µL transcription).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add enough gel elution buffer to cover gel bits so they can move around when rocked (typically ~500µL per 100µL transcription).

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: Freeze the resuspended gel bits for 30 minutes on dry ice or at -80°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Freeze the resuspended gel bits for 30 minutes on dry ice or at -80°C.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 25 of In vitro transcription of S. pyogenes Cas9 sgRNAs from two complementary oligos
source_data.protocol_name: In vitro transcription of S. pyogenes Cas9 sgRNAs from two complementary oligos
source_data.protocol_name_html: In vitro transcription of S. pyogenes Cas9 sgRNAs from two complementary oligos
source_data.annotation: This fractures the gel bits and increases yield.
source_data.thread_text: This fractures the gel bits and increases yield.
source_data.body: This fractures the gel bits and increases yield.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: PAUSE Rock overnight at 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: PAUSE Rock overnight at 4°C.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: For small scale transcription, filter the gel bits through a 0.45 micron filter. Use a P-1000 tip with the end cut off using a razor blade to collect all the gel bits into the filter.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: For small scale transcription, filter the gel bits through a 0.45 micron filter. Use a P-1000 tip with the end cut off using a razor blade to collect all the gel bits into the filter.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 27 of In vitro transcription of S. pyogenes Cas9 sgRNAs from two complementary oligos
source_data.protocol_name: In vitro transcription of S. pyogenes Cas9 sgRNAs from two complementary oligos
source_data.protocol_name_html: In vitro transcription of S. pyogenes Cas9 sgRNAs from two complementary oligos
source_data.annotation: The SDS may precipitate during this process, especially if left on ice. If so, repeat filtration using a new filter.
source_data.thread_text: The SDS may precipitate during this process, especially if left on ice. If so, repeat filtration using a new filter.
source_data.body: The SDS may precipitate during this process, especially if left on ice. If so, repeat filtration using a new filter.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: For large scale transcription, vortex the gel bits and pour all of it onto a flip-top conical tube filter. Allow to vacuum filter until no more drops are retained.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: For large scale transcription, vortex the gel bits and pour all of it onto a flip-top conical tube filter. Allow to vacuum filter until no more drops are retained.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: Ethanol precipitate the RNA by adding 1/1000 volumes glycoblue and 2.5 volumes 100% ethanol.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Ethanol precipitate the RNA by adding 1/1000 volumes glycoblue and 2.5 volumes 100% ethanol.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: Incubate at -80°C for at least 1 hour but note that RNA under EtOH is stable for months at -80°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at -80°C for at least 1 hour but note that RNA under EtOH is stable for months at -80°C.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: Spin down at 16k g (small-scale) or 5k g (large-scale) for 25 minutes at 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin down at 16k g (small-scale) or 5k g (large-scale) for 25 minutes at 4°C.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 31 of In vitro transcription of S. pyogenes Cas9 sgRNAs from two complementary oligos
source_data.protocol_name: In vitro transcription of S. pyogenes Cas9 sgRNAs from two complementary oligos
source_data.protocol_name_html: In vitro transcription of S. pyogenes Cas9 sgRNAs from two complementary oligos
source_data.annotation: For large-scale transcription, resuspend the pellet from above in 500µL of -20 degree 100% EtOH and transfer to a microfuge tube. The pellet will remain chunky - collect all the chunks with more ethanol if needed. Spin again at 16k g for 5 minutes to re-pellet.
source_data.thread_text: For large-scale transcription, resuspend the pellet from above in 500µL of -20 degree 100% EtOH and transfer to a microfuge tube. The pellet will remain chunky - collect all the chunks with more ethanol if needed. Spin again at 16k g for 5 minutes to re-pellet.
source_data.body: For large-scale transcription, resuspend the pellet from above in 500µL of -20 degree 100% EtOH and transfer to a microfuge tube. The pellet will remain chunky - collect all the chunks with more ethanol if needed. Spin again at 16k g for 5 minutes to re-pellet.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: Aspirate supernatant and discard, being careful not to dislodge pellet.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Aspirate supernatant and discard, being careful not to dislodge pellet.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: Wash pellet with 500µL -20°C 70% ethanol.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash pellet with 500µL -20°C 70% ethanol.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 33 of In vitro transcription of S. pyogenes Cas9 sgRNAs from two complementary oligos
source_data.protocol_name: In vitro transcription of S. pyogenes Cas9 sgRNAs from two complementary oligos
source_data.protocol_name_html: In vitro transcription of S. pyogenes Cas9 sgRNAs from two complementary oligos
source_data.annotation: CRITICAL Pipet the 70% ethanol gently not onto the pellet. Keep the tube cold to avoid resuspending the RNA in the 70% ethanol.
source_data.thread_text: CRITICAL Pipet the 70% ethanol gently not onto the pellet. Keep the tube cold to avoid resuspending the RNA in the 70% ethanol.
source_data.body: CRITICAL Pipet the 70% ethanol gently not onto the pellet. Keep the tube cold to avoid resuspending the RNA in the 70% ethanol.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: Resuspend pellet in ~30µL DEPC H2O per 100µL transcription and quantify using nanodrop or qubit.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend pellet in ~30µL DEPC H2O per 100µL transcription and quantify using nanodrop or qubit.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: Spin at 16k g for 5 minutes at 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin at 16k g for 5 minutes at 4°C.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: Aspirate supernatant carefully and discard.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Aspirate supernatant carefully and discard.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: Quick spin in tabletop centrifuge.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Quick spin in tabletop centrifuge.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: Aspirate remaining ethanol and discard.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Aspirate remaining ethanol and discard.

components.data: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cleanup option #2: Gel purify transcribed RNA

components.data: Air dry at room temperature for 5 minutes with the tube cap open.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Air dry at room temperature for 5 minutes with the tube cap open.
